name: Ampier
description:
Use the Ampier plugin for Figma to create stunning AMP and HTML email designs for your campaigns within your favorite design environment. Export the ready-to-use code as an archive or connect your designs to Ampier directly.


Use auto layout and predefined assets for a quick start. Read the detailed Ampier plugin documentation here: https://docs.ampier.io/figma/


  • Intuitive Workflow. No tech skills required. Create your AMP email designs in a fast and convenient way. 
  • HTML + AMP Code. Export tested bulletproof code for full-featured AMP campaigns.    


This plugin is currently in beta. Feel free to contact us if you have any questions.
